p:
Many countries are following SARS-CoV-2 non-pharmaceutical mitigation policies, and, with the current data, it is impossible to determine how long such policies will be needed to establish sufficient herd immunity. Modeling suggests recurrent SARS-CoV-2 epidemic phases flaring up on the background of an endemic disease dictated by relaxation and reinstitution of the package of non-pharmaceutical interventions until an effective pharmacological treatment/prevention against COVID-19 will be available.
